Our mission every day is to make available to small and mid-sized businesses, the business advisory solutions and expertise typically only available to large well capitalized companies, enabling them to achieve their long-term financial, economic and operational vision. We seek to understand the unique needs of each client, offering a customized solution using highly motivated, highly skilled management consultants at a reasonable cost.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1518769937967{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1518770040254{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Mission” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:25px|text_align:left|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1508923447795{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Our objective every day is to help our clients make substantial improvements in their performance and to build a great firm. We partner with our clients’, providing unparalleled support and turnkey business management and financial solutions as they grow from small to profitable mid-sized firms.

[/vc_column_text]

  • We are a management consulting firm specialized in business plans, marketing plans, financial planning, human resource and change management.
  • We consider the principles of sustainable development
  • We develop long-term relationships with our clients and partners based on professionalism and loyalty
  • Our Innovation assures business sustainability and succession
  • Our consulting, training and coaching is based on SMART principles.

Evolving business by doing the right things, the right way.  Isef Business Consult is a firm grounded in the following principles:

[/vc_column_text]

  • Innovation: developing optimized structure and exploring new interdependences systemically
  • Transparency: making comprehensible decisions and Informing stakeholders comprehensively
  • Quality: meeting the expectations of our stakeholders by delivering high process- & result quality and by applying best management practices
  • Empowerment: increasing the degree of autonomy by assigning and accepting responsibility
  • Sustainable Development: considering the principles of sustainable development in co-operations and developing structures and context-relationships sustainably
